title: Welcome
text:
Welcome
Hello world, this is my first blog post.
I can write in markdown
print("Hello World")
I can also write math equations:
\[
y = x^2
\]
I can create lists easily:

One
Two

I can also create numbered lists:

One
Two

Or, create a table:



Name
Age




Alice
20


Bob
21

title: Interactive Data Visualization …
text:
from IPython.display import display, HTML

html_content = """
<h1 style="text-align:center; font-family:Arial, sans-serif; color:#333;">
    Interactive Data Visualization with <span style="color:#007bff; font-weight:bold;">Ipychart</span>: A Python-Chart.js Bridge
</h1>
"""
display(HTML(html_content))



    Interactive Data Visualization with Ipychart: A Python-Chart.js Bridge
